name: Popdeem
overview:
Popdeem is a mobile application that rewards users based on their social influence. Users sign up through Facebook and Popdeem calculates their ‘Hype Score’. The ‘Hype Score’ is a measure of a users ability to influence friends in their network. The higher your ‘Hype Score’ on Popdeem, the bigger the rewards you will earn.

By providing key influencers with rewards brands can drive social actions and generate valuable word of mouth. We track the performance of campaigns and provide real-time analytics for brands to measure the impact of influencers.

Popdeem is currently operating in private beta. They are developing their iOS app, which is set to launch early 2013.
